message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $7000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $8200. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be more careful with my budget. I can do $7600, can you meet me there?

I understand you're trying to be mindful of your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $8000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair deal considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still a bit short of my target, so I can do $7800. Can you meet me there?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $8100. This is the best I can do, and I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still trying to make the best deal I can. I can do $7900. Can you meet me there?

I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $8050. This is the final price I'm willing to accept. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm not willing to go above $7850. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.
